{{Wireless embedded system |brand=E-TOP |model=NR620g |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=11/03/2007 |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router,NAS |fcc_id=U6ANR620G |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Star |cpu1_model=STR9105 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5DS16M16CS-5T |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0,IDE,Mini PCI,PCMCIA (32-bit) |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2561 |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2527 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=IC+ |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=3G capable |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} '''Navi N620Rg'''
There is an ITE IT8211F IDE controller and Ricoh R5C485 CardBus controller on board. The wireless module is probably an [[E-TOP WM101m]].
The FCC test report lists the following models as identical... *E-TOP 3R621G, MR622G, DR620G, NR621G *SAPIDO GR-1520, WE-1510, WE-1520, WE-1530, GR-1530 *Amigo 3R621g, MR622g, DR620g, NR620g, NR621g
Default settings are per the FCC manual.
